title: Attukula Payasam/ Poha Kheer/Pressed rice sweet || Krishna Janmashtami Spl ðŸ˜ƒ
content:
Ingredients: Pressed Rice / Poha / Attukullu - 1 cup Milk - 3 cups Sugar - 2 tb sp Ghee - 1 teaspoon Cashew nuts - chopped- 1/2 tb sp Almonds - chopped - 1 teaspoon Procedure:
  • Fry chopped cashew nuts and Almonds in ghee
  • keep them aside
  • Boil milk in another pan
  • Add pressed rice / attukullu
  • Close with lid
  • Cook 5 minutes , stir in between
  • Add ghee and sugar
  • Mix them well and close the lid
  • Cook for 2 minutes , stir in between
  • Take out sweet in serving bowl
  • Quick and tasty sweet recipe is ready to serve
